summary: "Goodfellas" is a 1990 American crime movie about a real-life gangster, Henry Hill, and his life from 1955 to 1980. Directed by Martin Scorsese, it's based on a book by Nicholas Pileggi. The film stars Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, and Joe Pesci. To get ready for their roles, the actors talked to Pileggi and even improvised some scenes. The movie was very popular and won many awards, including an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for Joe Pesci. It's now considered one of the best movies ever made, especially in the gangster genre.
title: Goodfellas
